TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PeerResolverBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement

Docs.summary: Defines the abstract base class for binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class defines the abstract base class for all binding elements used to create peer resolver objects. For specific implementations of this class, please see the documentation for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement other) cil managed

Docs.param: object to copy when creating this class instance.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by duplicating the provided object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver CreatePeerResolver() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a peer resolver object with the settings defined on this binding element.
Docs.returns: object that is used to perform peer name to address resolution. The settings on the peer resolver must be defined on the binding element.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers created with binding elements created by implementations of this class.
Docs.value: enumeration value that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
